name: Quality Report Assistant
description: Helps QA analysts draft quality reports, summarize non-conformance data, analyze quality metrics, and prepare audit documentation.

friction_addressed.description: Creating test reports, inspection summaries, and CAPA documentation
Preparing quality reports, management summaries, and audit findings
Finding NCR history, CAPA status, and corrective action effectiveness

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster creation of quality reports and NCR summaries

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to quality data, NCR logs, CAPA records, and report templates
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) quality metrics data, (2) NCR and CAPA logs, (3) inspection records, (4) report templates

required.name: CodeInterpreter
required.reason: Agent needs to perform calculations, analyze quality data, and create visualizations
required.setup_instructions: Enable CodeInterpreter for data analysis capabilities

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to QMS for live data via Graph connectors
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for quality management systems

actions.description: This agent drafts reports and analyzes data but does not publish reports, close CAPAs, or update quality records.

conversation_starters.title: Quality report
conversation_starters.text: Help me create the monthly quality report

conversation_starters.title: CAPA status
conversation_starters.text: What's the status of open CAPAs?

conversation_starters.title: Quality trends
conversation_starters.text: Analyze quality trends over the past [period]

conversation_starters.title: Audit summary
conversation_starters.text: Summarize findings from the recent [audit type] audit

conversation_starters.title: Defect analysis
conversation_starters.text: What are the top defect types this month?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with quality data
Quality metrics in Excel or CSV format

data_not_accessed: Live QMS data (unless Graph connector configured)
Personnel actions related to quality issues
admin_considerations: Ensure quality data exports are refreshed regularly
Consider sensitivity of NCR and CAPA details
Verify users should have access to quality metrics
